event.name: track
event.description: The track we run, see “Track name list”. Setting a wrong value will also print out the available track keys in the log. With the 1.1 update containing the 2019 season content, each track has a _2019 variant. Using this track will set the BoP and track grip correspondingly.

event.name: preRaceWaitingTimeSeconds
event.description: Preparation time before a race. Cannot be less than 30s

event.name: ambientTemp
event.description: Sets the baseline ambient temperature in °C, see “Race weekend simulation“

event.name: cloudLevel
event.description:
Sets the baseline cloud level, see “Race weekend simulation”.
Values (0.0, 0.1, …. 1.0

event.name: rain
event.description:
If weather randomness is off, defines the static rain level. With dynamic weather, it increases the rain chance.
Values (0.0, 0.1, …. 1.0

event.name: weatherRandomness
event.description:
Sets the dynamic weather level, see “Race weekend simulation”.
0 = static weather; 1-4 fairly realistic weather; 5-7 more sensational (but less chaotic compared to versions before 1.0.7)

event.name: postQualySeconds
event.description:
The time after the last driver is finished (or the sessionOverTimeSeconds passed) in Q sessions and the race start.
Should not be set to 0, otherwise grid spawning is not secure

event.name: postRaceSeconds
event.description: Additional time after the race ended for everyone, before the next race weekend starts.

event.name: metaData
event.description: A user defined string that will be transferred to the result outputs.
